amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent a project from being approved under the timeline set forth in the bill if the project would limit access to or opportunities for hunting or fishing, or impact an endangered or threatened species under the Endangered Species Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 114-261 to prevent a project from being approved under the timeline set forth in the bill if the project would limit access to or opportunities for hunting or fishing, or impact an endangered or threatened species under the Endangered Species Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 223 (Roll no. 512).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 223 (Roll no. 512).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mrs. Dingell.
